capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Professor McGonagall look like that before. She's always been very serious and stern when it comes to discipline in the classroom. I'm not surprised she's giving those students a hard time today.

I've seen Professor McGonagall look that serious before, especially when it comes to dealing with the Dark Arts. She's always been very stern and authoritative, but I think there's more to her expression than just a simple scowl. It's like she's trying to convey a sense of gravity and importance, as if whatever is bothering her is worth taking seriously.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria, how old was mcgonagall when she became the transfiguration professor?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's amazing to think that she's an adult now. I mean, can you believe it? She's still teaching Transfiguration at Hogwarts and looking as fierce as ever. I'm pretty sure of it, I've seen the pictures of her in her old age and she still has that same sharp mind and quick wit that made her such a great professor when I was a student there.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that the character Filch from Harry Potter is considered an adult. That's confirmed by most sources, and I'm certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of filch before, but i'm so excited to learn more about it!
